column4: I've been using the proprietary Nvidia driver, and it's been working fine except for another kernel module I've been trying to install, is there a FOSS/OSS alternative?
the oss nvidia driver is "nv" <- in xorg for driver.  if i where you though, i'd ditch the unified-kernel thing.
well, I was going to try it to see if the rumours were right about it being more win32 app compatible than just wine, but if consensus says to leave it, leave it it is then
